settings.title: Become an EcoPartner and collaborate with us to move the needle and save our planet!
How does Ecoterra contribute to saving the planet?
settings.content: Eating is a basic need. We all do it, every day. Therefore, to save our planet, we believe that the real revolution is in agriculture, food is the way.today, modern industrial agriculture resorts to annual monocultures, toxic herbicides and pesticides, synthetic fertilizers and water wastage, all of which are destroying topsoil much faster than it can be replenished. This leads to other major costs: lousy living conditions for animals, disengagement of small farmers, tasteless food that makes people sick, and an absurd amount of food waste.We are certain that if we want to move the needle and save our home, changes in agriculture are the most necessary. And that is Ecoterra, an alternative that ensures animal welfare, minimizes food waste, protects farm workers and innovates practices that care for our soils.At Ecoterra we do much more than food. We do innovation and development to guarantee honest products, through the creation of fair, replicable and scalable production models. We collaborate with nature to build purposeful foods that are part of the solution and not part of the problem.

settings.title: How do you link small agricultural producers (Ecofarmers) socially?
settings.content:
Through fair trade practices. These are:

  • Fair, transparent and formal contracts. No fine print.
  • Payment at fair prices (aligned with the market) and on time.
  • Assurance of the purchase of production (short, medium and long term) to reduce uncertainty and avoid food waste.
  • Financial support to enhance your sustainable production.
  • Technical support to achieve the best production standards.

settings.title: ¿Cuál es la diferencia entre Cage Free y Free Range? ¿Qué sistema usa Ecoterra?
settings.content:
Todos los huevos Ecoterra son Free Range, certificados por el sello Certified Humane.

La diferencia entre ambos sistemas es que el sistema Free Range asegura la salida de las aves a praderas de riego (2m2 por ave), en cambio, Cage Free solo asegura que sean aves libres de jaula pero sin salida del aviario (0,14 m2 por ave).

settings.title: ¿Hay un monto mínimo de compra para convertirse en cliente?
settings.content: El monto mínimo son 2 cajas de producto. El pago es a través de factura.

settings.title: ¿Cuál es la frecuencia de despachos?
settings.content: Depende de la comuna en que se encuentre tu negocio, ya que trabajamos con un calendario de despachos por sector.  Los pedidos se tienen que hacer con 48 hrs de anticipación.
